General.Name: Mingchen Health Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Mingchen Health Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of personal health care products in China. It offers skin care, shampoo, hair care, and styling products under the Dihua Zhixiu, MEWON, Chucui, Golden Lion, Likoujian, Green Power, and Eihsia brands. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Ming Chen Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Mingchen Health Co.,Ltd. Mingchen Health Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shantou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Dong Song  Chen
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors, Deputy GM & Director
